name: Whack Your Ex
description: Enjoy this classic game as a mobile app!  Tap on items and activate the cartoon whackings.  If you love the Whack Your Ex flash game you'll LOVE this new version now with extra ways to whack him or her!  Release tension as you witness the fun and thrills of classic flash animation brought to life by the gang at Whack Your Boss and Doodieman.  Use the plane or the brick or the car to Whack Your Ex.  Plenty of new surprises.  Brought to you by Petesso.
